//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 5-1=4
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to hit you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to hit <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 4+0=4
hit_dmg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s with a great pipe mace!
hit_dmg_npc: %1$s hits <npcname>'s %2$s with a great pipe mace!
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to hit you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to hit <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 5+0=5
hit_dmg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s with a fire axe!
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to hit you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to hit <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 5+0=5
hit_dmg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s with a Halligan bar!
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to hit you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to hit <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 3-2=1
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to hit you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to hit <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 3+3=6
hit_dmg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s with a baseball bat!
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to hit you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to hit <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to taze your %2$s, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to taze <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s tries to taze your %2$s, but fails to penetrate your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s tries to taze <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 3-2=1
hit_dmg_u: %1$s slashes your %2$s with a glass shiv!
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to slash you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to slash <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s slashes your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 3-2=1
hit_dmg_u: %1$s stabs your %2$s with a rusty spike!
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to stab you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to stab <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s stabs your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 4-2=2
hit_dmg_u: %1$s slices your %2$s with a crude greatsword!
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to slice you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to slice <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s slices your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 4+0=4
hit_dmg_u: %1$s bashes your %2$s with a rusted wrench!
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to bash you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to bash <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s bashes your %2$s without penetrating your armor.

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 4-1=3
hit_dmg_u: %1$s thrusts a spear arm at you, and pierces your %2$s!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's spear arm hits your %2$s, but it glances off your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's spear arm hits <npcname>, but it glances off their armor.
miss_msg_u: %s thrusts a spear arm at you, but you evade!
miss_msg_npc: %s's thrusts a spear arm at <npcname>, but they dodge!

//: Feral melee skill + weapon's to hit, so 2-1=1
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to hit you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to hit <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s hits your %2$s without penetrating your armor.
